page.title: 01THE GLENAGOORLAND AREA
page.content: This area is a{rural area}which does not have any villages or towns.Most of the land is arable farm land with quite a bit of rough grazing. In the south of the region the land is about 60m above sea level and in the north of the area about 300m above sea level.This higher land is mostly covered with{peat and heather. The landscape is generally hilly. There are{172 people}living in the area.There are 118 adults and{56 {children}under 18.Roughly there are 4 people living in each house.
